content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to share your experience with me. Please do reach out to me after your first meditation session on Saturday, and I'll be happy to hear about your progress.

Remember, the most important thing is to be kind to yourself and have fun with the process. Meditation is a journey, and it's okay to take it one step at a time.

If you have any questions or need further guidance before Saturday, feel free to ask. I'll be here to support you every step of the way.

Wishing you a wonderful Saturday morning meditation session, and I look forward to hearing about your experience!

Take care, and happy meditating!
